channel.title: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?
channel.description:
i need help changing the client so i can have it connect to my no-ip or my computer ip? im not sure which one it has to be?
here is the pastebin link for my client.java [url=http://pastebin.com/9RXZrb9x]http://pastebin.com/9RXZrb9x[/url]
please if someone can either change this for me or help me change it? i would appreciate it
if you will change it for me my no-ip is tainted-pkz.no-ip.org and if u need my computers ip just let me know =p il pm it to you or add my msn [url=http://smokes_blunts@live.com]smokes_blunts@live.com[/url]

item.title: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Search in your Gui.java file
i look for this

	private Gui(String args[]) 
	{
		super();
			try {

			System.out.println("Loading client..");
			Serverip = "------.no-ip.org";
			sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
 			initUI();
		} 
		catch(Exception ex)
		{
			ex.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

Unsure if this works but its what i did.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?

item.title: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

For people to connect to your server change the ip to your no-ip Then make a .rar File so you can release it, once thats done change back to 127.0.0.1 so you can connect to it. Now you can connect to it and other people can connect to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Impossible, if the IP for your players to connect is 127.0.0.1 it will not work. You need to fix it and re-upload the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing my client.java to connect to my source?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ta1nt3d, post:3, topic:373341”]there is no gui.java but what i am asking is how can i change the client to connect to source after i upload it for ppl to download
so they can download it click play and connect to my server[/quote]
You change the current IP to your No-Ip.
